channel.title: Help on a few things please... ^_^
channel.description: Hey guys, I am kinda new to this this (yea, I know, go ahead and call me a noob) and I am having difficulty with a few things. I have a really good autospawn.cfg, but they don't say anything... ^_^ If possible, can someone please post or send me the file that controls what the NPC's say, but like a pre-made version (I don't even know what it's called)? If you do so, please post them all. I have an autospawn.cfg that includes all the NPCs in Runescape. Also, if possible, can you include the shops.cfg too? Thanks so much. Last question. I need to edit my exp multiplier, because the player gets around 4 exp per hit XD. I went into my cleint.java, found combatexp, and changed all the variables, but still nothing changed. Maybe I did something wrong, I don't know. If you need them, I can post my autospawn.cfg, shops.cfg, and my client.java, but only if you need them to assist me in solving my problem. Thanks a lot for your time, all!!

item.title: Help on a few things please... ^_^
item.dc:creator: @ninjascape9 ninjascape9
item.description:
@ninjascape9 wrote:

Hey guys, I am kinda new to this this (yea, I know, go ahead and call me a noob) and I am having difficulty with a few things. I have a really good autospawn.cfg, but they don’t say anything… If possible, can someone please post or send me the file that controls what the NPC’s say, but like a pre-made version (I don’t even know what it’s called)? If you do so, please post them all. I have an autospawn.cfg that includes all the NPCs in Runescape. Also, if possible, can you include the shops.cfg too? Thanks so much. Last question. I need to edit my exp multiplier, because the player gets around 4 exp per hit XD. I went into my cleint.java, found combatexp, and changed all the variables, but still nothing changed. Maybe I did something wrong, I don’t know. If you need them, I can post my autospawn.cfg, shops.cfg, and my client.java, but only if you need them to assist me in solving my problem. Thanks a lot for your time, all!!

Read full topic
